shortDescription.shortDescription: This YouTube channel documents Dr. Carlotta Berry’s guidebook for members of academia to use open-source hardware for service, education, and research. It describes the creation of an open-source mobile robot platform with the flexiblity and modularity for modification based upon experience level, educational, outreach, or research goals.

childMarkdownRemark.html: This YouTube channel documents Dr. Carlotta Berry’s guidebook for members of academia to use open-source hardware for service, education, and research. It describes the creation of an open-source mobile robot platform with the flexiblity and modularity for modification based upon experience level, educational, outreach, or research goals.
